```{r load-data}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggrepel)
wheels <- read_csv("./wheels.csv")
```

```{r warning=FALSE}
str(wheels)
# do dimentions of a wheel associates with ride time?

wheels %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = diameter, color = height, y = ride_duration_minutes)) +
  geom_point(alpha=0.7)+
  geom_text_repel(aes(label = country), vjust = -0.5, size = 3, max.overlaps = 4)+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm",se=FALSE)+
  theme_minimal()+
  labs(x="Diameter",y="Ride Duration (min)",color="Height", title="Do bigger ferris wheel have longer ride?")

```

AI statement: help with gg_text_repel.
